subject: Sales
title: Define Your Unique Value
description: One-minute skill: Define Your Unique Value.

hook.text: What makes you the seller buyers should pick? If you can't answer in ten words, neither can they.

buildup.text: A unique value proposition is the specific benefit only you provide. It's your competitive moat.

discovery.text: The best UVPs solve a specific problem for a specific audience better than any alternative available.

twist.text: Most sellers call themselves 'hardworking' or 'dedicated.' That's not unique â€” that's a baseline.

climax.text: Find the intersection: what you do best, what buyers need most, and what competitors cannot match.

punchline.text: If everyone says it, it's not unique. Find what's yours.

quiz.question: What makes a value proposition truly unique?
options: Solving a specific problem better than any alternative
